title: Real-Time On-Chain Data Processing Platform
description: Real-time Ethereum analytics backend that ingests mempool/new blocks over WebSockets, tracks txs/contract deployments, decodes EVM logs (topics + event signatures) to classify DEX swaps (Uniswap V2/V3, Curve), and serves historical queries via an Express REST API without hammering RPCs. Added safety signals like bytecode-based trust scoring (selector + storage-access patterns) and honeypot detection via on-chain simulation, plus ABI recovery for unverified/proxy contracts.

title: Multi-Chain Crypto Subscription Bot
description: Multi-chain Telegram subscription bot (GrammyJS) for EVM + Solana that detects on-chain payments in real time. Dynamic USD pricing following market rates using Chainlink price oracles, and a non-custodial flow with automated wallet generation, consolidation, and trial/access lifecycle management backed by MongoDB/Mongoose.
